thread.section_title: Keepkey Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Keepkey | keepkey.com | 2 of 9
thread.title: Paul Townsend

author: Paul Townsend
title: Paul Townsend
text: The first time I saw KeepKey was when I watched a Bitcoin seminar put on at my work. I was intrigued with the seminar, both around cryptocurrency but also with the sleek, cool storage device our expert was using. Later, when I was researching hardware wallets for Bitcoin KeepKey was at the top of the list. I ordered KeepKey at a reasonable price and it arrived in only a few day. Based on all available hardware wallets I would recommend KeepKey.
